tictactoe

Class TicTacToeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • tictactoe.TicTacToeGame

  • public class TicTacToeGame
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a fully functional Tic-Tac-Toe board and makes all decisions regarding the state of the game.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthew Shampine, Connor Dudas

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TicTacToeGame()
      Constructor that initializes board, filling all of the cells with default values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Cell getCell(int row, int col)
      This helper method checks that the current cell exists.
      GameStatus getGameStatus()
      Getter method that returns the current status of the game.
      Player getPlayer()
      Getter method that returns the current player's turn.
      void selectCell(int row, int col)
      This method handles the logic when a user clicks on a cell.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TicTacToeGame

        public TicTacToeGame()
        Constructor that initializes board, filling all of the cells with default values. In addition, gameStatus is initialized to NotOverYet and the player is set to X.

    • Method Detail

      • selectCell

        public void selectCell(int row,
                       int col)
        This method handles the logic when a user clicks on a cell. It first marks the cell, then checks whether or not the game is over. If the game is not yet over it will toggle the player.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell location
        col - The col of the cell location

      • getCell

        public Cell getCell(int row,
                    int col)
        This helper method checks that the current cell exists. If the cell does not exist it returns null and if the cell does exist it returns that cell.
        Parameters:
        row - The row of the cell location
        col - The col of the cell location
        Returns:
        Cell This returns the cell, provided that it exists

      • getGameStatus

        public GameStatus getGameStatus()
        Getter method that returns the current status of the game.
        Returns:
        gameStatus The current status of the game

      • getPlayer

        public Player getPlayer()
        Getter method that returns the current player's turn.
        Returns:
        player The current player's turn.
